item.title: Graphs Part 1 - Detect Cycle in an Undirected Graph
item.description: Question Definition (S & T) Given an undirected graph, how to check if there is a cycle in the graph ? Example 1: Inputï¼šn = 4 , e = 4, the edges = { 0 1, 1 2, 2 3, 0 2 } Output: yes Diagram: has circle Example 2: Input: n = 4, e = 3, the edges: { 0 1, 1 2, 2 3 }
